Package commInfra

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • commInfra.Message
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Internal structure of the exchanged messages.

    Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Message

        public Message​(int type)
        Message instantiation (form 1).
        Parameters:
        type - message type.

      • Message

        public Message​(int type,
               int id)
        Message instantiation (form 2).
        Parameters:
        type - message type.
        id - the state of the Master Thief, the Assault Party ID in the case of the GET_NEXT_ASSAULT_PARTY_ID_DONE or DISBAND_ASSAULT_PARTY messages; the Room ID in GET_ROOM_DONE, GET_ROOM_DISTANCE_MUSEUM, GET_ROOM_PAINTINGS_MUSEUM, GET_ROOM_DISTANCE_COLLECTION_SITE and GET_ROOM_PAINTINGS_COLLECTION_SITE; the number of paintings in PRINT_TAIL, GET_ROOM_PAINTINGS_COLLECTION_SITE_DONE, GET_ROOM_PAINTINGS_MUSEUM_DONE, GET_TOTAL_PAINTINGS_DONE; the identification of the Ordinary Thief for HAS_BUSY_HANDS or REMOVE_MEMBER or the room distance in GET_ROOM_DISTANCE_COLLECTION_SITE_DONE, GET_ROOM_DISTANCE_MUSEUM_DONE.

      • Message

        public Message​(int type,
               boolean res)
        Message instantiation (form 3).
        Parameters:
        type - message type.
        res - whether the Assault Party is in operation in SET_IN_OPERATION, IS_ASSAULT_PARTY_IN_OPERATION_DONE; whether the Ordinary Thief holds a canvas in HAS_BUSY_HANDS_DONE; whether the Ordinary Thief is a member of an Assault Party in IS_MEMBER_DONE; whether the Assault Party is empty in the other cases.

      • Message

        public Message​(int type,
               char operation)
        Message instantiation (form 4).
        Parameters:
        type - message type.
        operation - the operation of the Master Thief.

      • Message

        public Message​(int type,
               int[] ordinaryThieves)
        Message instantiation (form 5).
        Parameters:
        type - message type.
        ordinaryThieves - the identifications of the Ordinary Thieves.

      • Message

        public Message​(int type,
               int id,
               int assaultPartyOrPaintings)
        Message instantiation (form 6).
        Parameters:
        type - message type.
        id - the identification of the room in SET_ASSAULT_PARTY_ROOM, SET_ROOM_STATE_LESS_ARGS; the identification of the Ordinary Thief in REMOVE_ASSAULT_PARTY_MEMBER; the state of the Master Thief, every other case.
        assaultPartyOrPaintings - the number of paintings in SET_ROOM_STATE_LESS_ARGS; the identification of the Assault Party in the other situations.

      • Message

        public Message​(int type,
               int ordinaryThiefOrRoomID,
               int ordinaryThiefStateOrRoomPaintings,
               int ordinaryThiefMDOrRoomDistance)
        Message instantiation (form 7).
        Parameters:
        type - message type.
        ordinaryThiefOrRoomID - the identification of the room in SET_ROOM_STATE, SET_ROOM; the identification of the Ordinary Thief every other case.
        ordinaryThiefStateOrRoomPaintings - the number of paintings in SET_ROOM_STATE, SET_ROOM; the state of the Ordinary Thief every other case.
        ordinaryThiefMDOrRoomDistance - the distance to the room in SET_ROOM_STATE, SET_ROOM; the maximum displacement of the Ordinary Thief every other case.

      • Message

        public Message​(int type,
               int ordinaryThiefID,
               int ordinaryThiefState,
               char ordinaryThiefSituation,
               int ordinaryThiefMD)
        Message instantiation (form 8).
        Parameters:
        type - message type.
        ordinaryThiefID - the identification of the Ordinary Thief.
        ordinaryThiefState - the state of the Ordinary Thief.
        ordinaryThiefSituation - the situation of the Ordinary Thief.
        ordinaryThiefMD - the maximum displacement of the Ordinary Thief.

      • Message

        public Message​(int type,
               int ordinaryThiefID,
               int ordinaryThiefStateOrPos,
               int ordinaryThiefMDOrCanvas,
               int assaultParty)
        Message instantiation (form 9).
        Parameters:
        type - message type.
        ordinaryThiefID - the identification of the Ordinary Thief.
        ordinaryThiefStateOrPos - the position of the Ordinary Thief in SET_ASSAULT_PARTY_MEMBER; the state of the Ordinary Thief in all other cases.
        ordinaryThiefMDOrCanvas - the number of canvas the Ordinary Thief holds in SET_ASSAULT_PARTY_MEMBER; the maximum displacement of the Ordinary Thief in all other cases.
        assaultParty - the identification of the Assault Party.

      • Message

               int ordinaryThiefID,

               boolean neededThief)

        ordinaryThiefID - the identification of the Ordinary Thief.
        ordinaryThiefState - the state of the Ordinary Thief.
        ordinaryThiefMD - the maximum displacement of the Ordinary Thief.
        neededThief - whether the Ordinary Thief is needed.

        public Message​(int type,
               int[] paintings,
               int[] distances)
        Message instantiation (form 11).
        Parameters:
        type - message type.
        paintings - the initial number of paintings in each room.
        distances - the distance to each room.

        ordinaryThiefID - the identification of the Ordinary Thief.
        canvas - whether the Ordinary Thief holds a canvas.
